wikipedia_page.main: Clifford Allen Saville (5 February 1892 – 8 November 1917) was an English first-class cricketer active in 1914 who played for Middlesex. The younger brother of Stanley Saville, he was born in Tottenham. He died on World War I active service at Fresnoy-le-Grand, Aisne in France.

link_mentions.page: List of cricketers who were killed during military service

response: Stanley Herbert Saville (21 November 1889 – 22 February 1966) was an English first-class cricketer active 1910–31 who played for Middlesex and Cambridge University. The elder brother of Clifford Saville, he was born in Tottenham; died in Eastbourne.Stanley Saville at CricketArchive
